name: @raythurnevoid/svelte-sapper-template
description: Svelte template with Sapper, Webpack, SCSS Modules and Typescript

scripts.copy: copyfiles ./build/**/*.* package.json tsconfig.json webpack* svelte.config.js lib
scripts.ts-node: npm run env -- node -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register --
scripts.analyze: npm run webpack -- --env analyzeBundle --env fancyProgress --config webpack.config.analyze.ts
scripts.debug: cross-env TS_NODE_PROJECT="tsconfig.tsnode.json" node --inspect -r ts-node/register -r tsconfig-paths/register node_modules/sapper/dist/cli.js dev

browserslist: last 1 year and >5% and supports es6-module
